fr.sorbonne_u.components.pubsub.components

Class Subscriber

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.pubsub.components.Subscriber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, Observer, SubscriberService

    public class Subscriber
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements SubscriberService, Observer
    A Subscriber component handles subscriber related requests and send them to the PubSub. The Subscriber implement all the methods of the two SubscriberService, Observer interfaces methods and delegates their implementations to its SubscriberOutBoundPort and its SubscriberInBoundPort.

    This component has a required interface SubscriberService.Required and an offered interface Observer.Offered so that the component can receive messages.

    The connection between this component SubscriberOutBoundPort and the PubSub component in-bound port is established by using the SubscriberServiceConnector class.

    The connection between this component SubscriberInBoundPort and the PubSub component out-bound port is established by using the ObserverConnector class.

    When A subscriber receive a message, it will execute a Consumer of a Message, note that the order of messages that this component will receive is not specified.

    A Subscriber ID is his in-bound port URI.

    In a CVM, this component need to establish the connection between his out-bound port and a PubSub component, however, in a Distributed CVM, this component need to establish the connection between his out-bound port and a PubSubNode component in-bound port.

    See Also:
    Subscriber.Builder, SubscriberService, Observer, SubscriberOutBoundPort, SubscriberInBoundPort, SubscriberServiceConnector, ObserverConnector
